Package feup.lpoo.reversi.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIModel
    Represents an AI player
    BoardModel
    Represents a game board
    GameCareTaker
    Holds set of game states, part of the Memento design pattern
    GameMemento
    Stores a game state, part of the memento design pattern
    GameModel
    Stores information about a game session
    MoveModel
    Represents a move and its effects (pieces to be rotated)
    PlayerModel
    Represents a player in-game
    UserModel
    Represents a human player
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState
    Possible general game states
    TurnState
    Possible in-game turn states while the game is still running
